front.title: Datagram Transport Layer Security for Stream Control Transmission Protocol

abstract.t: This document describes the usage of the Datagram Transport Layer Security (DTLS) protocol over the Stream Control Transmission Protocol (SCTP). Security features provided by DTLS over SCTP include authentication, message integrity and privacy of user messages. Applications using DTLS over SCTP can use almost all transport features provided by SCTP and its extensions.
